trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa um cabeçalho de coluna para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objeto é um controle de botão que é derivado de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> Propriedades de controle de eventos de mouse e o redimensionamento de colunas.

trans-unit.source: Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cabeçalhos de coluna em uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> modo de exibição são <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objetos.

trans-unit.source: You can customize <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: Você pode personalizar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objetos usando uma variedade de propriedades que são encontradas nesta classe e classes relacionadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre essas propriedades e a precedência entre elas, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e visão geral de modelos](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, que significa que ele pode conter um único objeto de qualquer tipo (como uma cadeia de caracteres, uma imagem ou um painel).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a classe <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> can contain a context (right-click) menu.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> pode conter um menu de contexto (direito).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a context menu for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> in XAML.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um menu de contexto para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> em XAML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> que está associada ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Responde quando a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> é pressionada.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Responde à criação da árvore visual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> e atualiza a versão de cabeçalho flutuante quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> evento quando uma coluna está mudando sua posição.

trans-unit.source: Provides an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" /> para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementação de <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> limpa captura do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não altera o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" /> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" /> quando o usuário pausa o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> evento quando o usuário arrasta um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> e sua coluna para um novo local em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> usando o mouse.

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para manipular o evento, o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> event when the mouse moves off the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> quando o mouse se move para fora do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> evento quando o usuário arrasta um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> com o mouse do local antigo para mover o cabeçalho e sua coluna.

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para manipular o evento, o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> quando o usuário pressiona o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> evento para que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> pode dar suporte à operação de arrastar e soltar que move uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta captura de método o mouse e conjuntos de <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> argumento do evento para `true`.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> quando o usuário libera o botão esquerdo do mouse ao pausar o ponteiro do mouse sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação trata o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> evento (que ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> é definido como `true`).

trans-unit.source: It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele também termina a captura do mouse que foi definida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: Isso fornece uma maneira para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para dar suporte à operação de arrastar e soltar que move uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> argumento do evento para `true`.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece manipulação de classes para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> que ocorre quando o usuário move o mouse dentro de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação mantém o botão esquerdo do mouse em um estado pressionado enquanto um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> é movido por uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.
trans-unit.target: Isso também faz o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> permaneça definida como `true` quando o mouse com o botão esquerdo do mouse pressionado é movido para fora do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação mantém o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> definido como argumento do evento `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> evento para que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método pode dar suporte à operação de arrastar e soltar que move uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre a alteração no tamanho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração nas dimensões de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a função de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole" /> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole" /> valor de enumeração que especifica a função atual da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classe executa o layout dos cabeçalhos de coluna em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> e coloca um cabeçalho de coluna adicional no fim de adicionar espaço.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Padding> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> valor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Padding> identifica esse cabeçalho de coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> valor <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating> identifica uma coluna que atualmente é o objeto de uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role" />.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da propriedade de dependência <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The dependency property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de dependência.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> deve ou não ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> must be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> precisar ser serializado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method applies to the following dependency properties:
trans-unit.target: Esse método se aplica às seguintes propriedades de dependência:
